name: Frostford's Mystery
description:
Despite the name, the city of Frostford has always been quite the warm, welcoming, and frankly calm place, most people living here know each other, for better or for worse that is, the most dangerous crime committed here would be a group of loud teenagers shoplifting and the most chaos would be a cat getting stuck on a tree, as cliché as that sounds.

You've lived your whole life here, working as a Detective, the quiet nature of the town is something you're used to, some would say your life is pretty boring and others would wish to have such a quiet life, yet when something important gets stolen and you overhear what could possibly be the most bizarre conversation on earth, you have no choices but to follow your curiosity, and where it would lead you cannot be possibly that dangerous, there is no way what you overheard is even real, right.

...right?
